text: General Khamtai Siphandon (; 8 February 1924 â€“ 2 April 2025) was a Laotian politician. He was President of Laos from 24 February 1998, until 8 June 2006, when he was officially replaced by Choummaly Sayasone. He also served as Prime Minister of Laos from 15 August 1991 to 24 February 1998. When he died in 2025, Laos and Vietnam declared national mourning to commemorate him. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:Asian military people Category:Communist politicians Category:Generals Category:Presidents of Laos Category:Prime Ministers of Laos Category:2025 deaths
title: Khamtai Siphandone
